channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-37437] ForSt checkpoint failure due to file not visible when writing
item.description:
We leverage `disableFileDeletions` and `enableFileDeletions` of ForSt to keep files alive during checkpoint. When checkpoint finished, the `enableFileDeletions` will be invoked, while ForSt will list all the files and check status. These files, however, include the writing ones, which is not visible in some DFS (e.g. oss or s3) yet. Although the checkpoints are actually not missing, the thrown exception make the finalization of checkpoint failed, resulting in consecutive cp failures.

The impact would be setups with object storages (e.g. oss or s3).

2025-03-08 00:03:45,064 INFO  org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks.AsyncCheckpointRunnable [] - Deduplicate[6] -> Calc[7] -> StreamRecordTimestampInserter[8] -> nexmark_q18[8]: Writer (1/8)#0 - asynchronous part of checkpoint 9 could not be completed.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
